languages.text: "И всех этих лицемеров наш{mf|ел|ла} никто ин{mf|ой|ая} как... наш{mf||а} звездн{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я} {name} фон Валанциус! Непревзойденный результат, Звездное Сиятельство! Браво, браво! Мейв, вручи же наш дар".
languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя FW_Prize_HideAndSeekBig_item.

traits.locale_text: "И всех этих лицемеров нашел никто иной как... наш звездный гость {name} фон Валанциус! Непревзойденный результат, Ваше Сиятельство! Браво, браво! Лидзи, вручи наш дар этому проницательнейшему из людей".

languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor Анимация "Лидзи подходит и дарит подарок" В конце куя FW_Prize_HideAndSeekBig_item.

languages.text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"
languages.original_text: "И всех этих лицемеров наш{mf|ел|ла} никто ин{mf|ой|ая} как... наш{mf||а} звездн{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я} {name} фон Валанциус! Непревзойденный результат, Звездное Сиятельство! Браво, браво! Мейв, вручи же наш дар".

traits.locale_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest {name} von Valancius! Unsurpassable show, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Bravo, bravo! Lidzy, present our gift!"
"All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest {name} von Valancius! Unsurpassable show, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Bravo, bravo! Lidzy, present our gift!"
"All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Bravo, bravo! Lidzy, present our gift!"
"All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Bravo, bravo! Lidzy, present our gift!"
"All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"
"All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

languages.text: “所有冒牌货都被揪了出来，而这位出色的猎手不是别人，正是……我们来自上界的贵客，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！真是一场无与伦比的精彩表演，来自上界的大人！了不起，了不起！梅芙，献上礼物吧！”
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: “所有冒牌货都被揪了出来，而这位出色的猎手不是别人，正是……我们来自上界的贵客，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！真是一场无与伦比的精彩表演，来自上界的大人！了不起，了不起！梅芙，献上礼物吧！”

languages.text: «Todos estos impostores han sido desenmascarados nada más y nada menos que por... ¡{mf|nuestro invitado|nuestra invitada} celestial, {name} von Valancius! ¡Una labor inigualable, Excelencia Celestial! ¡Bravo, bravo! ¡Maive, entrégale nuestro obsequio!».
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: «Todos estos impostores han sido desenmascarados nada más y nada menos que por... ¡{mf|nuestro invitado|nuestra invitada} celestial, {name} von Valancius! ¡Una labor inigualable, Excelencia Celestial! ¡Bravo, bravo! ¡Maive, entrégale nuestro obsequio!».

languages.text: "Tüm bu taklitçiler, herhangi biri tarafından değil... Semavi misafirimiz {name} von Valancius tarafından tespit edildi! Eşsiz bir performans sergilediniz Semavi Efendimiz! Bravo! Maive, armağanımızı verelim!"
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bu taklitçiler, herhangi biri tarafından değil... Semavi misafirimiz {name} von Valancius tarafından tespit edildi! Eşsiz bir performans sergilediniz Semavi Efendimiz! Bravo! Maive, armağanımızı verelim!"

languages.text: 「偽者たちはすべて、天のお客人、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスによって見破られました！素晴らしいショーです、閣下！ブラボー、ブラボー！メイヴ、賞品を持ってきなさい！」
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: 「偽者たちはすべて、天のお客人、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスによって見破られました！素晴らしいショーです、閣下！ブラボー、ブラボー！メイヴ、賞品を持ってきなさい！」

languages.text: « Tous ces imposteurs ont été démasqués par {mf|nul|nulle} autre que... notre céleste hôte, {name} von Valancius ! Quelle performance hors norme, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Bravo, bravo ! Maive, notre cadeau ! »
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: « Tous ces imposteurs ont été démasqués par {mf|nul|nulle} autre que... notre céleste hôte, {name} von Valancius ! Quelle performance hors norme, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Bravo, bravo ! Maive, notre cadeau ! »

languages.text: "All diese Hochstapler wurden von niemand Geringerem enttarnt als ... unserem himmlischen Gast, {name} von Valancius! Eine unübertreffliche Vorstellung, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Bravo, bravo! Maive, überreicht unser Geschenk!"
languages.original_text: "All these impostors have been found out by none other than... our celestial guest, {name} von Valancius! An unsurpassable show, Your Celestial Highness! Bravo, bravo! Maive, present our gift!"

traits.locale_text: "All diese Hochstapler wurden von niemand Geringerem enttarnt als ... unserem himmlischen Gast, {name} von Valancius! Eine unübertreffliche Vorstellung, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Bravo, bravo! Maive, überreicht unser Geschenk!"
